channel.title: Best coders read this[pi]
channel.description:
well this is what i am trying to do...add a points system called ..."zombie points"
basicly i kill a npc "421=zombie" and i get points lets say 5 points
and i want to add a zombie shop that you buy items for zombie points
add my msn badboyzacko_2k8@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Best coders read this[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You can reference this to a slayer point shop very same concept.

Read full topic

item.title: Best coders read this[pi]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:2, topic:395987”]Find your NPC Death method in NPCHandler.java use ‘case 421:’ there (for zombie) and add something with the character token you made for zombie points e.g. “c.zombieTokens ++;” Something like that.

For the shop, use ShopAssistant/Shophandler.java for that.[/quote]
I think he doesnt only need the shop but he need the whole zombie points system.

Read full topic

item.title: Best coders read this[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Find your NPC Death method in NPCHandler.java use ‘case 421:’ there (for zombie) and add something with the character token you made for zombie points e.g. “c.zombieTokens ++;” Something like that.

For the shop, use ShopAssistant/Shophandler.java for that.

Read full topic
